# Prompt Usage Policy

## Purpose
Define how prompts may be used within the governed AI development environment.

## Policy Rules
- Only approved prompts may be used.
- Prompts must be role-based and reusable.
- Domain knowledge must not exist in prompts.

## Approved Prompt Roles
- Code Generator
- Code Reviewer
- Unit Test Generator
- Code Comments Generator

## Prohibited Usage
- Domain-specific prompts
- Ad-hoc or one-off prompts
- Prompt duplication with overlapping behavior
- Prompts that override instruction constraints

## Enforcement
Any prompt violating this policy is non-compliant
and must not be used in production environments.
